filename: JA-207652 Student and Staff Computing Devices FINAL.pdf

data.Title: JA-207652 Student and Staff Computing Devices
data.Term of Bid: 5 years total (3 years with up to 2 one‑year extensions)
data.Any Additional Documentation Required: Manufacturer certifications, factory‑authorized repair and maintenance certifications, and other supporting documentation as requested
data.Product Specification: Minimum hardware requirements for student and staff computing devices including laptops, desktops, tablets, and monitors. Tier 1 Small Student Chromebook Laptop: Intel Celeron N100 or equivalent, 11.6" display, 720p camera, 1366x768 resolution, 8GB DDR5, 64GB eMMC, 802.11AX Wi‑Fi 6E, Bluetooth 5.1, 65W Type‑C power supply, 10‑hour battery, USB 3.0, Type‑C, headphone/microphone combo.

filename: Student and Staff Computing Devices __SOURCING #168884__ - Bid Information - {3} _ BidNet Direct.html

data.Title: Student and Staff Computing Devices **SOURCING #168884**
data.Product Specification: Specifications include, but are not limited to: This Request for Proposal (RFP) will be for student and staff computing devices, including laptops, desktops, tablet devices, and display monitors. Vendors participating in this Request for Proposal (RFP) may submit proposals for one, several, or all categories of devices required by the District. Within each category of device, the District reserves the right to award contracts to a single vendor or multiple vendors. The specifications listed in this RFP are the minimum hardware requirements for each tier of device required by Dallas ISD. Vendors responding to this RFP must have the ability to provide the District with significant quantities of devices as requested in the pricing lines in this RFP. Note that quantities requested by Dallas ISD are estimates to be ordered over the five years of the contracts resulting from this RFP. Purchases may also include a variety of device accessories which will be ordered in a bundle along with the devices.
